mop 0.0.1

Read and tidy a Synergy2 file

read_synergy2.Rd

Read and tidy a Synergy2 file

Usage

read_synergy2(path)

Arguments

path

Path to the Synergy2 .txt file

Value

A list, with the following form:

data

a tibble with all well-level experimental data combined

wavelengths

a numeric vector containing the wavelengths read

metadata

A list containing residual, non-well data

Examples

system.file("extdata", "bca-assay-all-export.txt", package = "mop") |>
  read_synergy2()
#> $data
